snippet.title: NOVA DRIFT - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
- Survive - Evolve - Dominate -
An ARPG-styled space brawler with immense mechanical depth and polish.  Developed by CHIMERIC, published by PIXELJAM.
Now Available!
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/858210/Nova_Drift/
Itch.io: https://pixeljam.itch.io/nova-drift
